    • Glamash

    Magnetic Eyeslashes for Women

    Client

    Glamash

    Industry

    Cosmetics

    Roles

    UX/UI Design

    Development

    Brief
    We are an E-commerce brand selling magnetic eyeliner, magnetic eyelashes and accessories targeting women in the age group of 18 to 45. So the design must have a feminine and modern feel to it. The landing page of the company should have a minimalist and yet a glamorous look.
    color palette
    ffe1e1
    333333
    f4f4f4
    1c1c1c
    8e3b3b
    Approach
    The overall layout and style of the website was given a modern and minimalist look with a glamorous feel. During the design process, the end user and their requirements were kept in mind. The subtle color combinations like pink and white were used with dash of bold color like black. This gave the website a very dynamic look.
